caption.title: Maps of predicted climate suitability for Pseudolarix amabilis across time stages.
caption.p: The Last Interglacial (A), the Last Glacial Maximum (B), the present (C), and 2080 (D). The spatial data was freely downloaded from http://www.diva-gis.org/Data, the base map was generated by ArcGIS v.9.3 ( http://www.esri.com/software/arcgis/arcgis-for-desktop).
